description: This file defines the ProfilePage React component, allowing users (specifically mechanics) to view and edit their profile information such as name and service area. It manages state for form inputs, handles form submission with async data updates via dataService, and renders a form UI with inputs and buttons.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Handles form submission to save the user's profile by calling dataService.updateProfile and updating parent component through onUserUpdated callback.

ctags.name: name
ctags.pattern: /^      const profile = { name: name.trim(), serviceArea: serviceArea.trim() };$/

ctags.name: profile
ctags.pattern: /^      const profile = { name: name.trim(), serviceArea: serviceArea.trim() };$/

ctags.name: serviceArea
ctags.pattern: /^      const profile = { name: name.trim(), serviceArea: serviceArea.trim() };$/

fields.name: const profile = { name: name.trim(), serviceArea: serviceArea.trim() };
